entry.title: Fetco CBS-2142XTS - Tall Twin Thermal Coffee Brewer with Touch Screen Controls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fetco
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 3577.00

Fetco's CBS-2140 touchscreen series are state-of-the-art coffee brewers that are built to provide simple, yet specific and highly-customizeable control options through a touchscreen interface.

More specifically, the CBS-2142XTS is dual station, thermal coffee brewer which can brew 14 gallons of coffee per hour. The CBS-2140 touchscreen series also comes with "Spray Dome" sprayhead technology, as well as a plastic coffee funnel. It brews into a 1.0 gallon "LUXUS" thermal dispenser or airpot.

      • Contemporary stainless steel finish
      • Touchscreen with advanced control and brewing options
      • "Spray Dome" sprayhead technology that evenly saturates the coffee bed for maximum flavor and aroma extraction
      • Durable brew basket with removable colour ID insert and built-in counter stand for easy brew prep
      • Brew basket sensors that automatically discontinue operation of brew cycle if basket is removed
      • Brews into 1.0 gallon airports or thermal dispensers
      • Manual water faucet that safely dispenses hot water away from steam and brew basket

VIDEO

          SPECS

          Model CBS-2142XTS 
          Item # E214251
          Dimensions (WDH) 19.7" x 20.3" x 34.3"
          ﻿Weight﻿ 47 lb
          Water Access Plumbed
          Electrical Connection Terminal Block
          Volts 200v - 240v
          Phase 1

          WARRANTY

          Warranty for manufactured equipment purchased for installation in the U.S. and Canada is as follows: 

              • Circuit boards – 3 years parts and 1 year labour 
              • Electromechanical parts – 2 years parts and 1 year labour
              • All other parts – 1 year parts and 1 year labour
              • Accessories and dispensers: 1 year parts only (airpot vacuum insulation – 1 year)
              • Dispenser funnels – 1 year 


          DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Fetco CBS-2141XTS - Tall Thermal Coffee Brewer with Touch Screen Controls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fetco
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 2714.00

Fetco's CBS-2140 touchscreen series are state-of-the-art coffee brewers that are built to provide simple, yet specific and highly-customizeable control options through a touchscreen interface.

More specifically, the CBS-2141XTS is a single station, thermal coffee brewer that functions at a wide variety of electrical configurations. As a result, whatever you select for electrical output will determine your coffee output as well.

The CBS-2140 touchscreen series also comes with "Spray Dome" sprayhead technology, as well as a plastic coffee funnel. It brews into a 1.0 gallon "LUXUS" thermal dispenser or airpot.

      • Durable brew basket with removable colour ID insert and built-in counter stand for easy brew prep
      • Brew basket sensors that automatically discontinue operation of brew cycle if basket is removed
      • Brews into 1.0 gallon airports or thermal dispensers
      • Manual water faucet that safely dispenses hot water away from steam and brew basket
      • Dual voltage adaptable (can operate at 120v or 208v-240v)

entry.title: Fetco CBS-1152V+ - Tall Twin Thermal Coffee Brewer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fetco
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 3441.00

Fetco's Extractor V+ series, model CBS-1152V+, is a twin thermal coffee brewer. This model comes with different phases and heater configurations, so as a result, it can vary in output. 

As a member of the Extractor V+ Series, the CBS-1152V+ comes with vibrant LED digital controls; "Spray Dome" sprayhead technology; and a plastic coffee funnel. This coffee brewer brews into a 1.5 gallon "LUXUS" thermal dispenser or airpot. If you're looking for a smaller coffee brewer that brews into a 1 gallon container, than there is a smaller version of this model available.

      • Stainless steel finish
      • LED digital controls with brewing options and control
      • Spray Dome sprayhead technology that evenly saturates the coffee bed for maximum flavor and aroma extraction
      • Common internal parts with other V+ models to drive service costs down
      • Durable brew basket with removable colour ID insert and built-in counter stand for easy brew prep
      • Brews into 3 litre or 1 gallon airports; or, 1 gallon, baseless, thermal dispensers
      • Manual water faucet that safely dispenses hot water away from steam and brew basket

SPECS

        E115251  208 - 240 6.9 - 9.1 3 22.5

entry.summary:
Vendor: Fetco
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 1414.00

Fetco's Extractor V+ series, model CBS-1131V+, is a single, thermal coffee brewer that is dual voltage, so it can function at 100v-120v, or 200v-240v. In the 100v-120v range, it can produce 3.9 or 5.8 gallons per hour. In the 200v-240v range it can produce 7.7 gallons per hour.

As a member of the Extractor V+ Series, the CBS-1131V+ comes with vibrant LED digital controls; "Spray Dome" sprayhead technology; and a plastic coffee funnel. This coffee brewer brews into a 1 gallon "LUXUS" thermal dispenser or airpot. If you're looking for a coffee brewer that brews into a 1.5 gallon container, than there is a taller version of this model available.

entry.title: Bunn Wave Combo - Commercial Tea and Coffee Brewer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bunn
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 922.00

The Bunn "Wave Combo" is a low profile, commercial tea and coffee brewer. It features Bunn's "SmartWAVE" technology, which increases turbulence in the brew funnel, providing more contact time between water and coffee and a uniformity of extraction. This machine can also make iced tea: 35 ounce concentrate, 90 ounce dilution.

You can use the slide-out booster and brew into 1.9 litre thermal carafes, or you can remove the slide-out booster and with its adjustable legs, it can accommodate up to 3 litre lever-action and 2.5 liter push-button Bunn airpots and thermal servers -- making this an extremely versatile little machine. It can brew up to 62 cups of coffee an hour (8 ounce cups).

      • "BrewMETER" allows automatic programming of pulse routine
      • Adjustable legs to accommodate up to 3.0 litre lever action and 2.5 litre push button Bunn airpots and thermal servers
      • Brew into 1.9 litre thermal carafe using the slide-out booster tray
      • Four-digit LED read-out for simple programming
      • Utilize the same LED read- out for brewer status (Ready, Heating, Brewing)
      • SmartWAVE technology increases turbulence in the brew funnel
      • Energy-saver mode reduces tank temperature during idle periods
      • Ensures coffee brew quality with cold brew lock out capability
      • "SplashGard" tea and coffee funnels (included) deflect hot liquids away from the hand
      • Iced Tea: 35oz concentrate, 90oz dilution.

      SPECS

      Model Wave Combo (or WAVE15-APS COMBO PF)
      Item Number 39900.6020
      Water Access Plumbed
      Finish Stainless
      Funnels Black plastic & Translucent tea funnel
      Electrical 120v, 11.3 A, 1350 W
      Cord Attached Yes
      Plug Type NEMA 5-15P
      Output 62 cups per hour (8 ounce cups)

      WARRANTY

      One year parts and labour warranty.

      DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Bunn Sure Immersion 312 - Commercial Single Serve Coffee Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bunn
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 8952.00 - 9091.00 (2 variants)

The Bunn Sure Immersion 312 "Bean to Cup" is a unique commercial coffee experience: it can dispense fresh coffee by the cup, or by the carafe, in 5 programmable portion sizes from 6 to 64 ounces. It has an intuitive 16" touch screen with large pictorial graphics, that provides an engaging drink selection process.

This machine gives you filter style coffee from a vacuum system with Air Infusion extraction control, resulting in a clean balanced cup with a smooth finish.

You can show off your business's unique brand through the screen saver and the brew video, as well as with the recipe images, names, and descriptors used throughout. In a convenience shop, office, airport mini-market, or diner -- this one machine can server all your hot beverage needs.

It has a sister model which is very similar (the Sure Immersions 220). The models are mostly similar, but with a few variations. That model has two 3-pound hoppers, two grinders, and a 10" touchscreen. And this model has three hoppers (two are 3-pound, and one is 2-pound), one grinder, two powder hoppers (5 pounds each), and a 17" touchscreen.

      • Filter style coffee from a vacuum system with exclusive Air Infusion extraction control resulting in a clean, balanced cup with a smooth finish
      • Hot and Iced coffee, plus 2 café style beverages to satisfy your menu requirements in one footprint
      • Each recipe has programmable air-infusion and immersion control for the ideal result in the cup
      • Dispenses fresh coffee by the cup or by the carafe, in 5 programmable portion sizes from 6oz to 64oz
      • 5.75" to 8.25" cup clearance
      • Two 3lb bean hoppers and one 2lb bean hopper for fresh, whole beans
      • Two 5lb powder hoppers
      • 17" touchscreen with ability to show promotional videos
      • Large pictorial graphics provide engaging drink selection
      • Picture Prompted Cleaning Step-by-step pictures guide the operator through proper cleaning techniques for dependable performance

VIDEO

SPECS

Model Sure Immersion 312
Product Number 44400.6200 and 44400.6201
Dimensions (WHD) 20.1" x 40.3" x 22.8"
Water Access Plumbed
Volts 120
Amps 15
Watts 1800
Cord Attached Yes
Plug Type NEMA 5-15P
Output Sixty-three 8 ounce cups per hour
Input Water Temperature 60°F
Phase 1
# Wires Plus Ground 2
Hertz 60

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Bunn ITCB-DV PE - Infusion Series Dual Voltage Tea and Coffee Brewer with Touch Screen & Flip Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bunn
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 1915.00

The Bunn ITCB-DV is a medium-volume coffee and tea combo brewer. It is a dual voltage machine that can operate at 120v/14 amp, or 120/208v/13 amp, or 120/240v/15 amp, and can brew 72-120 cups of coffee an hour or up to 334 cups of tea (8 ounce cups). 

It is a "Platinum Edition" of their Infusion series, so it comes with a 4.3" touchscreen; SmartWAVE sprayhead technology; and a stainless steel coffee funnel.

      • 4.3" Color Touchscreen aids in customizing recipes, brewing options and control
      • The QWERTY key pad feature allows for easy customization of recipe names in English, Spanish and French
      • SmartWAVE sprayhead technology creates an industry best uniformity of extraction for exceptionally smooth tasting coffee
      • Customers can easily add up to 10 screensaver images to advertise and promote their brand and products
      • USB port for easy programming
      • BUNN Infusion Series technology allows for multiple recipes from one footprint
      • Includes both coffee (Stainless) and tea (Plastic) funnels
      • Energy-saver mode reduces tank temperature during idle periods
      • Exclusive Peak Extraction Sprayhead is multi- directional with a
      • 7-hole design to ensure ultimate uniformity of extraction
      • Electronic funnel lock prevents removal of each brew funnel until drip-through is complete
      • Pre-infusion and pulse brew for maximum flavor extraction. Cold brew lockout & digital temperature control further ensure top-notch brewing
      • Brews into all BUNN iced tea dispensers (except TDS-5), 1.9 to
      • 3.8 liter airpots, thermal carafes --- and can accommodate BUNN
      • ThermoFresh Servers [servers not included]
      • Includes integrated flip tray that converts to three positions: thermal carafe, airpot and tea dispenser
      • Dual voltage adaptable (can operate at 120V/15 amp or 120/208-240V/20 amp)

    VIDEO

    SPECS

    Model ITCB-DV Platinum
    Item # 52500.6100
    Water Access Plumbed
    Volts Dual Voltage
    Coffee Output 80-163 cups per hour (8 ounce cups)
    Tea Output 334 cups per hour (8 ounce cups)

    WARRANTY

    One year parts and labour warranty.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Bunn ITCB DV HV PE - Infusion Series Dual Voltage Tea and Coffee Brewer with Touch Screen Controls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bunn
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 2232.00

The Bunn ITCB Twin HV is a high-volume coffee and tea combo brewer. This is a dual voltage model, so can operate at 120v/14amp, or 120/280v/14amp, or 120/240/17amp. The lower voltage can brew up to 82 cups of coffee an hour; the middle voltage 136 cups; and the highest voltage 183 cups an hour (8 ounce cups). And each voltage can brew up to 336 cups of tea an hour. It also has a dilution feature, so this can also function as a iced coffee brewer.

This is part of Bunn's Infusion Series of coffee equipment, so it features all the latest technology: it has a "Smart Funnel" and is compatible with "BrewWISE grinders" as well as featuring "Digital Brewer Controls" which give you precise controls over extraction and sophisticated diagnostics.

It is a "Platinum Edition" of their Infusion series, so it comes with a 4.3" touchscreen; SmartWAVE sprayhead technology; and a stainless steel coffee funnel.

      • 4.3" Color Touchscreen aids in customizing recipes, brewing options and control
      • The QWERTY key pad feature allows for easy customization of recipe names in English, Spanish and French
      • SmartWAVE sprayhead technology provides enhanced uniformity of extraction and lime scale reduction
      • Customers can easily add up to 10 screensaver images to advertise and promote their brand and products
      • Brews into 1.5 gallon and 1.0 gallon BUNN ThermoFresh servers for coffee and TD4T, TDO and TDO-N tea dispensers
      • Dilution feature also allows for brewing iced coffee
      • Includes both coffee (Stainless) and tea (Plastic) funnels
      • Tea brewing capability built-in with integrated dilution nozzle, software and Quick Brew tea brewing funnel
      • BrewWISE intelligence with pre-infusion and pulse brew for maximum flavor extraction
      • Digital temperature control and cold brew lockout
      • Energy-saver mode reduces tank temperature during idle periods
      • Large 3 gallon (11.4 litre) tank provides back-to-back brewing capacity
      • Dual voltage adaptable (Can operate at 120V/15 amp or 120/208-240V/20 amp)

    VIDEO

    SPECS

    Model ITCB Dual-Volt High Volume, Platinum Edition
    Item # 54000.6100
    Water Access Plumbed

entry.summary:

Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 2606.00

The Bunn ITCB Twin HV is a high-volume coffee and tea combo brewer. It can brew up to 280 cups of coffee an hour and up to 672 cups of tea an hour (8 ounce cups). It also has a dilution feature, so this can also function as a iced coffee brewer.

This is part of Bunn's Infusion Series of coffee equipment, so it features all the latest technology: it has a "Smart Funnel" and is compatible with "BrewWISE grinders" as well as featuring "Digital Brewer Controls" which give you precise controls over extraction and sophisticated diagnostics.

      • Brews into 1 and 1.5 gallon "ThermoFresh" servers for coffee and TD4T, TDO and TDO-N tea dispensers
      • Dilution feature also allows for brewing iced coffee
      • Includes both coffee and tea funnels
      • Tea brewing capability built-in with integrated dilution nozzle, software and Quick Brew tea brewing funnel
      • "BrewWISE" intelligence with pre-infusion and pulse brew for maximum flavor extraction
      • Digital temperature control and cold brew lockout
      • Digital display in English/Spanish for easier programming and control. Advertising messages and machine status also displayed.
      • Display capable of showing English or Metric measurements.
      • Energy-saver mode reduces tank temperature during idle periods
      • Includes overlay kit for customization of brewer interface
      • Three brew buttons per side allow for up to six separate brewing profiles. Two programmable batch switches allow full and half batch brewing.
      • Large 5.6 gallon (21.2 litre) tank provides back-to-back brewing capacity at 120/208-240v applications
      • Brews coffee or tea on both sides - Mix and Match to meet your needs

    VIDEO

    Water Access Plumbed
    Volts Dual Voltage

entry.title: Bunn ITCB-DV HV - Infusion Series Dual Voltage Tea and Coffee Brewer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bunn
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 1674.00

The Bunn ITCB-DV HV is a high-volume coffee and tea combo brewer. This is a dual voltage model, so can operate at 120v/15amp, or 120/280v/20amp, or 120/240/20amp. The lower voltage can brew up to 82 cups of coffee an hour; the middle voltage 136 cups; and the highest voltage 181 cups an hour (8 ounce cups). And each voltage can brew up to 334 cups of tea an hour. It also has a dilution feature, so this can also function as a iced coffee brewer.

This is part of Bunn's Infusion Series of coffee equipment, so it features all the latest technology: it has a "Smart Funnel" and is compatible with "BrewWISE grinders" as well as featuring "Digital Brewer Controls" which give you precise controls over extraction and sophisticated diagnostics.

      • Brews into 1 and 1.5 gallon "ThermoFresh" servers for coffee and TD4T, TDO and TDO-N tea dispensers

      • Digital temperature control and cold brew lockout
      • Digital display in English/Spanish for easier programming and control. Advertising messages and machine status also displayed.
      • Display capable of showing English or Metric measurements.
      • Energy-saver mode reduces tank temperature during idle periods
      • Includes overlay kit for customization of brewer interface
      • Three brew buttons allow for 3 separate brewing profiles. Two programmable batch switches allow full and half batch brewing.

entry.title: Bunn U3 - High Volume Urn Commercial Coffee Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bunn
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 4009.00 - 4434.00 (6 variants)

The Bunn U3 Twin is a unique urn brewer that is perfect for high volume establishments. Its large water tank holds over 20 gallons (75.7 liter) and it has a half-batch option. You're also able to draw off hot water during the brew cycle without affecting coffee quality. Depending on the options you choose, it can brew anywhere between 268 and 310 cups of coffee an hour (8 ounce cups).

      • Half-batch option
      • Large water tank–over 20 gallon
      • Unique design assures extremely low evaporation loss to maintain the brew at its flavorful peak
      • All stainless steel construction
      • Draw off hot water during brewing cycle without affecting coffee quality
      • Top mounted components for ease of service

entry.title: Bunn Titan Dual - High Volume Commercial Coffee Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bunn
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 4741.00

The Bunn Titan coffee brewer is a high volume solution which uses fresh-ground coffee and features Bunn's "Digital Brewer Control," which will give you precise extraction control with pre-infusion and pulse brew and digital temperature control.

This brewer can make up to 34.3 gallons (82.2 liters) of coffee an hour. In single phase, it can brew up to 382 cups of coffee an hour, and in three phase it can brew up to 560 cups an hour (8 ounce cups). It can brew into Titan 1.5 and 3 gallon servers (5.7 and 11.4 litre) which are insulated to keep coffee hot for hours.

      • Brews up to 34.3 gallons (82.2 liters) of coffee per hour, while ensuring "quality in the cup" for each and every cup
      • BrewMETER allows automatic programming of pulse routine
      • Coffee extraction controlled with pre-infusion and pulse brew, digital temperature control, and large sprayhead; coffee strength controlled with variable by-pass
      • Funnel has 28oz (.8kg) ground coffee capacity and paper filter retainers to eliminate fold-over
      • Titan TF server [not included] is insulated to keep coffee hot forhours
      • Energy-saver mode reduces tank temperature during idle periods
      • Hot water faucet

SPECS

Phase 1 or 3

Watts 12000

entry.title: Bunn VPR-TC - Pourover Thermal Carafe Coffee Brewer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bunn
Type: Coffee Machine
Price: 412.00

The Bunn VPR-TC is a commercial coffee machine that brews directly into  airpots. It is a pourover machine, so it requires no plumbing or special wiring, and needs no warming stations. It can produce up to 62 cups of coffee an hour (8 ounce cups).

It has a side-to-side design, so that it can rest against the wall, which will free up countertop space.

      • Internal components are constructed from stainless steel
      • Just pour cold water in top and coffee brews immediately
      • Pourover brewer requires no plumbing – completely portable
      • SplashGard funnel deflects hot liquids away from the hand
      • Accommodates thermal carafe up to 8.5" (21.6 cm) tall
      • Use in quick turn environments where high quality coffee is continuously refreshed

SPECS

Model VPR-TC
Item # 33200.6011
Water Access Pourover
Funnel Black Plastic
Volts 120
Amps 11.5
Watts 1375
Cord Attached Yes
Plug Type NEMA 5-15P
Output 62 cups per hour (8 ounce cups)
Phase 1
# Wires plus Ground 2
